title: Help Omeluum Investigate the Parasite
content:
llowing dialogue options.

Can you extract the tadpole? What happens if that stasis goes away?

Choosing dialogue 1 will reveal that Omeluum cannot take out the parasite without great damage and trauma. This will give you the following dialogue options.

That doesn't sound ideal. Don't waste my time. Say what you mean.

Choosing dialogue 1 reveals that if Omeluum performed the extraction, you could die. But he is willing to perform another examination if you transform. This will give you the fol
